mapper.sql: id, userId, pid, type, name, level, description, json_extract(step,'$') step, file, status, createtime, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_case where pid=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND status =1
mapper.insert: insert into t_case (id, userId, pid, type, name, level, description, step, file, status, createtime, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{step,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into t_case
id,
userId,

mapper.update:
update t_case
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
step = #{step,jdbcType=CHAR},
file = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_case set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step = #{step,jdbcType=CHAR}, file = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
